title: Sync 'Our Solutions' dropdown with active solution category while scrolling

requirements.text: Update the /solutions landing page content so that it contains 6 scrollable, clearly separated sections (one per solution category), and each category section renders a list/grid of its respective solution services as links.

quotes: nice now also on "Our Solutions" drop down menu 6 solution catagories appear let it show respective solutions when we scroll to specific solution category

acceptanceCriteria: Visiting /solutions shows 6 distinct category sections matching the existing 6 solution categories in the navigation.
Each category section includes a link-list (or equivalent grid) of the services for that category, using the existing solutionServices registry as the source of truth.
Each category section has a stable DOM anchor/id so it can be observed/highlighted while scrolling.

requirements.text: Implement scroll-sync behavior so that when a user scrolls within /solutions and a specific solution category section becomes active (in viewport), the SiteHeader 'Our Solutions' dropdown updates to show/highlight the respective solutions for that active category.

quotes: let it show respective solutions when we scroll to specific solution category

acceptanceCriteria: On /solutions, as the user scrolls through the 6 category sections, the header 'Our Solutions' dropdown visibly reflects the currently active category (e.g., highlighted category item).
On /solutions, the dropdown also shows the service links for the currently active category (using the same routes already defined for service pages).
On pages other than /solutions, the 'Our Solutions' dropdown remains in its normal/default state (no scroll-sync required).
The implementation does not require any backend changes and does not break existing navigation links/routes.

constraints: Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui (shadcn components are read-only).
Do not edit frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, or frontend/src/main.tsx (immutable paths).
Backend remains single-actor; no backend changes are required for this feature.
nonGoals: Do not add new solution categories beyond the existing six.
Do not implement real-time features (e.g., WebSockets) or any backend-driven navigation state.
Do not change the existing service page routes/URLs.
